titles.title: Vets Rx Act of 2005
To amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Department of Veterans Affairs to fill prescriptions for drugs and medicines written by private physicians.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 5/16/2005--Introduced. Vets RX Act of 2005 - Requires Department of Veterans Affairs pharmacies to dispense medications to eligible veterans on prescriptions written by private practitioners.
